name: Dark Sales
description:
Dark Sales is a 2D action RPG that takes place in a modern office setting. It was built from the ground up by a single developer over the span of 2 years.

Welcome to Nardrol, a dark world run by cruel supervisors and ruthless bosses. Lower level employees are treated like dirt to be trodden upon and the tyranny of the elite reigns supreme.

Prophecy tells of a Chosen Salesman which will bring an end to the endless cycle of pain and seemingly random firings which plagues the land. Your time has come to bring truth to the legend. Enter Dark Sales.
